clinical_study.brief_title: Hyperthyroidism: Methimazole Plus L-carnitine and Selenium
clinical_study.official_title: Association of Methimazole With L-carnitine and Selenium in Patients With Hyperthyroidism

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to investigate the benefits of methimazole treatment in patients with hyperthyroidism, associated with supplementation of L-carnitine and Selenium.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline QoL at 6 months of supplementation
primary_outcome.description: Improvement of the patients' quality of life through questionnaire

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from 6-months supplementation QoL at 12 months of intervention (end of study)
primary_outcome.description: Improvement of the patients' quality of life through questionnaire

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Four time points: baseline; after 3 months of supplementation; after 6 months of supplementation; end of the study (12 months)
secondary_outcome.description: Change in serum TRAb (TSH receptor antibodies)
